verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessed quietness, holy quietnessâ€” What assurance in my soul! On the stormy sea He speaks peace to me. How the billows cease to roll!{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Bringing life and health and gladness All around, this heavenly Guest Banished unbelief and sadness, Changed our weariness to rest.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Like the rain that falls from heaven, Like the sunlight from the sky, So the Holy Ghost is given, Coming to us from on high.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}See a fruitful field is growing Blessed fruits of righteousness, And the streams of life are flowing In the lonely wilderness.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What a wonderful salvation Where we always see His face! What a perfect habitation! What a quiet resting place!{/lang-eng}
